sentences.en: A haughty girl is always unpopular at school.
sentences.cn: 骄傲的女孩子在学校常常不受人欢迎.

sentences.en: Alton has made himself fiercely unpopular in certain circles.
sentences.cn: 奥尔顿把自己搞得在某些圈子里极其不受欢迎。

sentences.en: He has also dared to take unpopular, but principled stands at times.
sentences.cn: 他有时也会大胆坚持不受欢迎、但却有原则性的立场。

sentences.en: He is a man with a reputation for being tough and unafraid of unpopular decisions.
sentences.cn: 他作风强悍，作决定不怕得罪人，这是出了名的。

sentences.en: He is justly unpopular with all.
sentences.cn: 他不受大家的欢迎是有道理的.

sentences.en: I will not hesitate to take unpopular decisions.
sentences.cn: 我会毫不犹豫地作出并不受欢迎的决定。

sentences.en: In high school, I was very unpopular, and I did encounter a little prejudice.
sentences.cn: 上中学的时候，我很不受欢迎，确实受到了一些歧视。

sentences.en: People who message a lot feel unpopular if they don't get many back.
sentences.cn: 如果人们发出大量短信但收到的回复却不多，就会觉得自己不受欢迎。

sentences.en: Several unpopular decisions diminished the governor's popularity.
sentences.cn: 几项不得人心的决定使州长的声望下降.

sentences.en: Such a work style is unpopular anywhere.
sentences.cn: 这种工作作风到哪儿都吃不开.

sentences.en: Taxes are unpopular — it is understandable that voters are against them.
sentences.cn: 税收不受欢迎——选民们反对是可以理解的。

sentences.en: The committee's confrontational style of campaigning has made it unpopular.
sentences.cn: 委员会咄咄逼人的宣传方式使其不得人心。

sentences.en: The country's leaders are unwilling to take unpopular measures to stop the rot.
sentences.cn: 该国领导人不愿采取不受欢迎的措施来阻止形势恶化。

sentences.en: The legislature repealed the unpopular Rent Act.
sentences.cn: 立法机关废除了不得人心的租借法案.

sentences.en: The proposed increase in income tax proved deeply unpopular with the electorate.
sentences.cn: 增加所得税的建议令选民十分不满。

trans.tran_cn: 不受欢迎的，不流行的，无人望的，不得人心的
